attributes.action: Denying Shamina Begum her return to the UK and strip off her British citizenship
attributes.additional_details:
She left the UK on free will to fight for a barbaric ideology!
She was old enough (not a child) to know the risks!
As she has no regrets, she is a security risk for this country!

Therefore the Government must deny the return of her and also similar individuals who fight for or support terrorism and strip off their british citizenship!
attributes.background: The Government must deny the return of Shamina Begum to the UK and strip off her british citizenship. We cannot allow or take the risk to let people like Shamina Begum back into the UK. One reason is, she doesn't even regret anything, shows that people like her are a security risk for this country
